name: Belisarius Cawl
description: Archmagos Dominus of Mars and architect of the Primaris project.

name: Logan Grimnar
description: The Great Wolf of the Space Wolves Chapter.

name: Yvraine
description: High Priestess of Ynnead and leader of the Ynnari.

name: Darkstrider
description: Master Pathfinder of the Tau Empire known for battlefield deception.

name: Typhus
description: Host of the Destroyer Hive and right hand of Mortarion.

name: Mephiston
description: Chief Librarian of the Blood Angels, once known as the Lord of Death.

name: Szarekh
description: Silent King of the Necrons, returned to lead his people.

name: Cypher
description: Mysterious Fallen Angel, hunted by the Imperium and Chaos alike.

name: Aun'Va
description: The Ethereal Supreme of the Tau Empire.

name: Kaldor Draigo
description: Supreme Grand Master of the Grey Knights, trapped in the Warp.
